text: Gay! Gavin!The girl and her luggage had disappeared and they were alone together. The porter brought Gavin's bag out to the taxi."Just a moment, darling, Gavin pressed her hand and smiled.'I want to check up on the flights back. quickly through the customs.Gay!Gavin The gin Qnd her luggage hod disoppeored and they were dlone together.
